intro: Kleinia pendula, commonly known as the hanging Kleinia, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It features fleshy, cylindrical stems that hang downward, giving it a unique appearance. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color. It thrives in well-draining soil and requires full sun to partial shade. Kleinia pendula is often cultivated for its ornamental value and drought tolerance.
